I noticed blood on the floor after hitting my foot and I have a large, irregularly shaped patch on my foot that is brown and black, with a red center and a yellow-white covering.

I'm not sure how long the patch has been there because I couldn't see the sole of my foot due to a previous injury.
Do you have a history of diabetes or any other chronic conditions?
I'm sorry, but I don't have information about any chronic conditions I might have.

I'm not sure about any family history regarding similar skin issues.

I'm unaware of any changes in the size or color of the patch since I first noticed it.
Final Diagnosis: Diabetic foot ulcer.
